pull.title: gdb attaching to process during tests has non-sudo solution
pull.body: There are some security considerations, so a link is attached.

events.body: I'm not sure what the policy is about linking static web-pages for informational purposes.

events.message: gdb attaching to process during tests has non-sudo solution

events.body: utACK (but I'm aware this solution exists and works and know this is correct) f96dbd1bbeeea82f07bc71c695fb17e8d7c9f1aa

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -175,7 +175,7 @@ cat /tmp/user/1000/testo9vsdjo3/node1/regtest/bitcoind.pid
 gdb /home/example/bitcoind <pid>
 ```
 
-Note: gdb attach step may require `sudo`
+Note: gdb attach step may require ptrace_scope to be set to 0, or sudo. See this link for considerations: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/security/Yama.txt

@@ -175,7 +175,7 @@ cat /tmp/user/1000/testo9vsdjo3/node1/regtest/bitcoind.pid
 gdb /home/example/bitcoind <pid>
 ```
 
-Note: gdb attach step may require `sudo`
